Summary Note:
Jost Müller Kägi and the RM were introduced at a charity run in Zürich. They ran side by side and discussed their philanthropic goals, which led to a meaningful collaboration.
With a career spanning nearly 36 years, Jost Müller Kägi has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Attracted by Julius Baer's reputation for excellence, he chose to join for the bespoke financial solutions offered.
Family Background: Jost Müller Kägi and Françoise have been married since 1999. They are proud parents of 1 child: Werner.
Education Background:
Jost finished secondary school at Kantonsschule Liestal Basel-Landschaft in 1983.
Jost pursued higher education at Webster University Geneva, graduating in 1989.
Occupation History:
Having worked for over 36 years, Jost Müller Kägi brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
In 1989, Jost Müller Kägi started working as a Ship Broker at Hapag-Lloyd (Switzerland) AG, marking the beginning of his successful career.
His subsequent role was as a Shipping Company Owner at Maersk Line (Switzerland) A/S, where he continued to grow professionally from 1991 to 1995.
He spent 30 years working as a Fleet Manager at Mediterranean Shipping Company (MSC) SA, refining his expertise and building a strong network.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout his career, he saved 1940000 CHF, investing in various assets to grow his wealth.
He has condo located in Baden, worth 2040000 CHF.

He inherited 4770000 CHF from his grandmother, a well-known Venture Capitalist, in 2009, allowing him to expand his investment portfolio.
Client Summary: Based on the information provided, we are excited about the client's financial journey and look forward to supporting him in achieving his financial goals.
